name: William R. GORDON, Petitioner, v. Rosemarie A. Feeney GORDON

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: William R. GORDON, Petitioner, v. Rosemarie A. Feeney GORDON.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Petition for Allowance of Appeal granted. Order of the Superior Court affirmed. 293 Pa.Super. 491, 439 A.2d 683 (1981).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stanley M. Shingles, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
William A. George, Media, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
449 A.2d 1378
William R. GORDON, Petitioner, v. Rosemarie A. Feeney GORDON.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 13, 1982.
Stanley M. Shingles, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
William A. George, Media, for respondent.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
